text: ined to a reality with matter densities as strident as your own. They are “masters of hologram” as are the Zeta, but the Ranthia have superior abilities in this regard. The physicality of the Ranthia could be compared to what in your system appears as water. That is, their “organic form” has the properties of fluidity you associate with the element of water. They can take on many forms because of this fluidity of form, yet they are a conscious, sentient, intelligent race of beings. Many of the visitors presently involved with Earth, both interdimensional and those of the Time Portal System, have the ability to bend the laws of physicality as you know them. Many of them are “shape-shifters” and can modulate the dimensional frequencies and time portals sufficiently so as to manifest to you in whatever form they
